messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] Frances 3yo ?
messages.msgSnippet: I have 3 year old twins (identical), are yours all boys? Wow, I can t imagine one more that age. How did you survive the earlier years? I have arms to carry
messages.messageBody:
I have 3 year old twins (identical), are yours all boys? Wow, I can't
imagine one more that age. How did you survive the earlier years?
I have arms to carry two, but how did you cope?
Frances

>From: GeorganneD@...
>Reply-To: Unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com
>To: Unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com
>Subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] Frances 3yo ?
>Date: Mon, 23 Apr 2001 14:03:05 EDT
>
>From your post about SCA, FRances, it sounds like you have more than one 3
>yo. I have 3 yo boy triplets. Would be interested in chatting about 3yo
>boys....
